sn55.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saranani sakko kalankato hoti.
sn55.24:1.5: Tatra sudam sambahula sakka sangamma samagamma ujjhayanti khiyanti vipacenti:
sn55.24:1.7: Ettha dani ko na sotapanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:1.8: Yatra hi nama saranani sakko kalankato;
sn55.24:2.1: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.24:2.5: Tatra sudam, bhante, sambahula sakka sangamma samagamma ujjhayanti khiyanti vipacenti—
sn55.24:2.6: acchariyam vata, bho, abbhutam vata, bho.
sn55.24:2.7: Ettha dani ko na sotapanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:2.8: Yatra hi nama saranani sakko kalankato;
sn55.24:3.1: “Yo so, mahanama, digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato, so katham vinipatam gaccheyya.
sn55.24:3.2: Yanhi tam, mahanama, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn55.24:3.3: ‘digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato’ti, saranani sakkam samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn55.24:3.4: Saranani, mahanama, sakko digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato.
sn55.24:4.1: Idha, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.24:4.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.24:4.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn55.24:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.24:5.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.24:5.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.24:5.5: hasapanno javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.24:5.6: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
sn55.24:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.24:6.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.24:6.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.24:6.5: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.24:6.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
sn55.24:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.24:7.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.24:7.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati;
sn55.24:7.5: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.24:7.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayanoti.
sn55.24:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.24:8.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti …
sn55.24:8.4: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.24:8.7: Tathagatappavedita cassa dhamma pannaya mattaso nijjhanam khamanti.
sn55.24:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo aganta nirayam aganta tiracchanayonim aganta pettivisayam aganta apayam duggatim vinipatam.
sn55.24:9.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti …
sn55.24:9.4: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato,
sn55.24:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo aganta nirayam aganta tiracchanayonim aganta pettivisayam aganta apayam duggatim vinipatam.
sn55.24:9.9: Ime cepi, mahanama, mahasala subhasitam dubbhasitam ajaneyyum, ime caham mahasale byakareyyam: ‘sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana’ti;
sn55.24:9.11: Saranani, mahanama, sakko maranakale sikkham samadiyi”ti.
